description: Developing a comprehensive platform for Naturals using React and Laravel. Focusing on scalable architecture and seamless user experience architecture.
achievements: Architecting the full-stack application using React and Laravel.

description: Developed a tourism website for Tours of Georgia, featuring itinerary planning, booking integrations, and a visually immersive gallery.
achievements: Created an immersive travel experience website.

company: Hope and Heal – Disability Aid Company
description: Designed and deployed a fully responsive WordPress website for Hope and Heal, a disability aid company, using Elementor and custom CSS to ensure accessibility and SEO compliance.

Optimized performance with smooth scrolling, intuitive navigation, and fast load time.

description: Built a visually engaging website for Zinda Exteriors using WordPress, Elementor, and Yoast SEO to showcase their exterior design services, stone work, and product catalog. Customized the layout for brand consistency and applies SEO best practices.
